component.name: LogoRRR
component.summary: Log files at a glance - a log viewer which is simple to use!

description.p: LogoRRR is a powerful desktop application designed to simplify the analysis of text files for recurring patterns.
Whether you’re searching for specific events in log files or analysing any other type of text file, LogoRRR makes the process effortless and efficient.

ul.li: Easy Pattern Recognition: Quickly identify recurring patterns in your text files.
Versatile Application: Perfect for log file analysis, but adaptable to any text file.
User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity and ease of use in mind.

screenshot.caption: Configure timestamps to enable time slot filtering
Use search term groups to filter for common events in all your log files
Search for interesting events by filtering out stuff you don't need, export the results to chats or email

description.p: This release contains various bug fixes and brings significant enhancements to user control and visualization.

ul.li:
**Customizable and Reusable Search Term Groups**:
Save and reuse sets of search terms (filters) across different log files.
Mark groups as global (❤️) for universal access, or keep them log-specific.
New 'default' and 'empty' groups are included for quick filtering and clearing.
The application remembers the last-used group when opening files.

**Show Occurrences of Each Search Term**:
Improves visual style by displaying the **number of hits** for each search term.
This enhancement also simplifies the process of closing/removing search terms.

** Reimplementation of tail functionality **
Live observation of log files is possible again
Uses less resources and works more consistently

** Use JRE 25 and JFX 25 **
Updates to latest JavaFX and JRE versions
